jokes: Why did the data scientist bring a ladder to class? To work with higher functions!
What's a data scientist's favorite snack? Byte-sized cookies!
Why don't data scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
What did the SQL query say to the table? 'Let me SELECT you something!'
Why was the math book sad? Because it had too many problems!
What's a data analyst's favorite exercise? Training models!
Why did the database administrator leave the party? Too many table flips!
What do you call a data scientist who's always negative? A NOTwork engineer!
Why did the programmer quit his job? Because he didn't get arrays!
What's a data engineer's favorite drink? Table joins!
How does a data scientist stay warm? They use a DataFrame!
What's a programmer's favorite place to hang out? The FOO bar!
Why do Python programmers wear glasses? Because they can't C#!
What did the data say to the neural network? 'You're being too deep!'
Why was six afraid of seven? Because 7 was a prime number!
